DOC.brief_title: Effect Nutritional Approach Combination With Cognitive Stimulation Child Cognitive Abilities
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study explore impact combine intervention include grow milk ( GUM ) fortify micronutrient cognitive stimulation cognitive ability , mother-child- interaction behavior child 3 5 year less enrich home environment HOME score less 26 . The control group receive skim milk extra stimulation material ( however , restriction normal mother-child interaction ) . The cognitive ability , mother-child interaction child behavior assess 6 month intervention .
DOC.criteria: Male Female child , age 3 ; 04 ; 11 year Having obtain legal representative 's informed consent Level stimulation home environment score 26 HOME inventory Normal cognitive development Neurological disorder Food allergy ( especially milk soy allergy ) Documented lactose intolerance Children special nutritional need Children chronic ( 7 consecutive day ) medication may impact cognitive performance Children living family/children foster home Subject expect comply study procedure Currently participate participate another clinical study last 4 week prior begin study
